DOC.brief_summary: The investigator propose evaluate whether innovative collaborative connect health ( CCH ) model increase access specialist improve patient outcome . CCH offer multiple modality patient primary care provider ( PCPs ) access dermatologist online directly asynchronously maximize effectiveness real-world setting . CCH also foster team care patient engagement active share management plan multidirectional , informed communication among patient , PCPs , dermatologists . The specific aim proposal ( 1 ) determine whether CCH model result equivalent improvement psoriasis disease severity compare in-person care , ( 2 ) determine whether CCH model result equivalent improvement quality life mental health compare in-person care , ( 3 ) ass whether CCH model provide good access care in-person care .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator propose conduct 12-month , pragmatic , randomize control trial evaluate impact collaborative connect health model psoriasis management compare inperson care . The pragmatic trial compare psoriasis severity , quality-of-life , mental health , access-to-care two model . We enroll 300 psoriasis patient Colorado California . In addition recruiting patient general population , place specific emphasis recruit psoriasis patient live rural underserved community . We also recruit full disease spectrum mild , moderate , severe psoriasis patient . We use intention-to-treat approach analyze outcomes perform longitudinal data analysis use repeat measure approach identify potential difference trend time two arm . To evaluate utility CCH increase access patient ' clinician ' perspective , study team conduct key informant interview use qualitative analytical technique investigator triangulation member check enhance validity conclusion .
DOC.criteria: Be age 18 year old Have physiciandiagnosed plaque psoriasis Have access internet digital camera mobile phone camera feature Have primary care provider ability establish primary care
